title.rendered: Experience Austin at the United States Grand Prix 2014

content.rendered:
Over 120,000 race car enthusiasts from around the world are expected for this year’s United States Grand Prix 2014 in Austin, Texas, October 31 to November 2, 2014. You can be there on race day to see who takes the checkered flag by booking a customized sports travel trip through Roadtrips.

As a race car fan, the likely place to start is with your itinerary is with the races. You can choose to attend the practice sessions on Friday, the qualifying sessions on Saturday, and the F1 circuit race on Sunday. If you choose all three race days, plan to arrive Thursday and leave Monday. Or, just attend race day, it’s entirely up to you.

Once you do decide on the dates to attend the United States Grand Prix 2014, then Roadtrips will book your flight be it economy, first class, or private jet. Transportation from your home to the airport, and airport to hotel will of course be arranged for you.

Your Grand Prix experience wouldn’t be yours if you didn’t choose your seating too. Roadtrips has four incredible seating packages for you to choose from. Each package of Sunday tickets corresponds to one of four grandstands, each of which is located at a strategic turn alongside the 3.4 mile Circuit of the Americas race track.

One of the spectators’ favorite grandstands is located at the spectacular corner of Turn 1. To reach Turn 1 from the start, drivers accelerate up a 133 foot hill then must negotiate an immediate, and blind, left turn. It is a true thrill to watch.

Turn 1 is the spot for hard core enthusiasts because the turns can be so harrowing to watch and are second to none on the F1 circuit. Fortunately for you, Roadtrips’ Turn 1 Hospitality Suite overlooks that corner. You can enjoy drinks, food, and a bird’s-eye view of the race cars arriving all from the comfort of this private balcony.

With race day action at the United States Grand Prix 2014 planned, customize the rest of your trip by taking full advantage of Roadtrips’ considerable knowledge of Austin-area events and nightlife, and concierge services.

Roadtrips will make reservations at your choice of high-end Austin hotels, the W Hotel Austin or the Hyatt Place Austin Downtown. These award winning hotels are within walking distance of many nightlife attractions, but you also have the option of hiring a private car throughout your stay to drive you out in the evening, as well as to and from the race track.

You won’t want to miss Roadtrips’ exclusive invitation to Austin’s hottest A-list United States Grand Prix 2014 parties on Friday night. Or, you can choose from a range of other Austin attractions. Roadtrips can book tee times at a local golf club, perhaps a spa treatment or two, or make recommendations for other events. Your hotel concierge services will be among the best in Austin and can act as expert guides to the best of Austin’s fine dining and life-music venues.

If you want to be in the driver’s seat, start planning your exclusive trip to the United States Grand Prix 2014. Contact the sport travel experts at Roadtrips and book your customized trip today.
